title: Dirty Cheater!
desc: Used a console command. Mom is disappointed.

desc: You left the square world. It's dark out here.

desc: Level 5 cleared. No survivors left.

desc: Paused 5 times in one run. Just play!

desc: You finished Level 1. Only 4 more to go!

title: Not Very Bright

title: Overpowered
